021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.tnemc.core.menu.handlers.StringSelectionHandler;
023import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
024import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
025import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
026import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.DataAction;
027import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.RunnableAction;
028import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
029import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.impl.StateIcon;
030import net.tnemc.menu.core.manager.MenuManager;
031import net.tnemc.menu.core.viewer.MenuViewer;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
035
036import java.util.Collections;
037import java.util.Locale;
038import java.util.Optional;
039import java.util.UUID;
040import java.util.function.Consumer;
041
042/**
043 * FlagSelectionPage
044 *
045 * @author creatorfromhell
046 * @since 0.1.3.0
047 */
048public class FlagSelectionPage {
049
050  protected final String returnMenu;
051  protected final String menuName;
052  protected final int menuPage;
053  protected final int returnPage;
054  protected final String flagsID;
055  protected final String flagPageID;
056  protected final int menuRows;
057
058  protected final Consumer<StringSelectionHandler> selectionListener;
059
060  public FlagSelectionPage(final String flagsID, final String returnMenu, final String menuName,
061                           final int menuPage, final int returnPage, final String flagPageID,
062                           final int menuRows, final Consumer<StringSelectionHandler> selectionListener) {
063
064    this.flagsID = flagsID;
065    this.returnMenu = returnMenu;
066    this.menuName = menuName;
067    this.menuPage = menuPage;
068    this.returnPage = returnPage;
069    this.flagPageID = flagPageID;
070
071    //we need a controller row and then at least one row for items.
072    this.menuRows = (menuRows <= 1)? 2 : menuRows;
073    this.selectionListener = selectionListener;
074  }
075
076  public void handle(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
077
078    final Optional<MenuViewer> viewer = callback.getPlayer().viewer();
079    if(viewer.isPresent()) {
080
081      final UUID id = viewer.get().uuid();
082
083      final int page = (Integer)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(flagPageID, 1);
084      final int items = (menuRows - 1) * 9;
085      final int start = ((page - 1) * items);
086      final int maxPages = (MenuManager.instance().getHelper().flags().size() / items) + (((MenuManager.instance().getHelper().flags().size() % items) > 0)? 1 : 0);
087
088      final int prev = (page <= 1)? maxPages : page - 1;
089      final int next = (page >= maxPages)? 1 : page + 1;
090
091      if(maxPages > 1) {
092
093        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("RED_WOOL", 1)
094                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPageDisplay"), id))
095                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPage"), id))))
096                                           .withActions(new DataAction(flagPageID, prev), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
097                                           .withSlot(0)
098                                           .build());
099
100        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GREEN_WOOL", 1)
101                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPageDisplay"), id))
102                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPage"), id))))
103                                           .withActions(new DataAction(flagPageID, next), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
104                                           .withSlot(8)
105                                           .build());
106      }
107
108      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BARRIER", 1)
109                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.EscapeDisplay"), id))
110                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Escape"), id))))
111                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
112                                         .withSlot(4)
113                                         .build());
114
115      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("ARROW", 1)
116                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Save"), id))
117                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Flags.Save"), id))))
118                                         .withActions(new RunnableAction((click)->{
119
120                                           if(selectionListener != null) {
121
122                                             final StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
123                                             for(final String flag : MenuManager.instance().getHelper().flags()) {
124
125                                               final String value = (String)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(menuName + "_" + flag, "Disabled");
126                                               final boolean enabled = value.equalsIgnoreCase("enabled");
127                                               if(enabled) {
128
129                                                 if(!builder.isEmpty()) {
130                                                   builder.append(",");
131                                                 }
132                                                 builder.append(flag);
133                                               }
134                                             }
135                                             selectionListener.accept(new StringSelectionHandler(click, builder.toString()));
136                                           }
137                                         }), new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
138                                         .withSlot(6)
139                                         .build());
140
141
142      for(int i = start; i < start + items; i++) {
143        if(MenuManager.instance().getHelper().flags().size() <= i) {
144          break;
145        }
146
147        final String flagName = MenuManager.instance().getHelper().flags().get(i);
148
149        final AbstractItemStack<?> disabledStack = PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().customName(Component.text(flagName + "(Disabled)")).of("RED_WOOL", 1);
150        final AbstractItemStack<?> enabledStack = PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().customName(Component.text(flagName + "(Enabled)")).of("GREEN_WOOL", 1);
151
152        //ender chest icon
153        final StateIcon flag = new StateIcon(disabledStack, null, menuName + "_" + flagName, "DISABLED", (currentState)->{
154          if(currentState.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT).equals("ENABLED")) {
155            return "DISABLED";
156          }
157          return "ENABLED";
158        });
159        flag.setSlot(9 + (i - start));
160        flag.addState("DISABLED", disabledStack.lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Flags.Add"), id))));
161        flag.addState("ENABLED", enabledStack.lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyEco.Flags.Remove"), id))));
162        callback.getPage().addIcon(flag);
163      }
164    }
165  }
166}
